wikitext.*:
'''BERÉK''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] without any given signification, except for what can be determined from its derivatives.<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 352 (root appearing as "BERÉK-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''berékā-'' ("wild")<ref name=LR/>
**[[Quenya]]: ''verka'' ("wild")
**[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''[[bregol]]'' ("violent, sudden"); ''breged'' ("violence, suddenness"); ''breitho'' ("break out suddenly")
{{DEFAULTSORT:BEREK}}
